perksWithImages.name: Scourge Hook: Floods of Rage
perksWithImages.description:
You form a psychic connection with The Entity and alter the rules of the trial.

At the start of the trial, {0} random hooks are changed into scourge hooks. You see their auras in white.

When a Survivor is unhooked from a scourge hook, all other Survivors have their auras revealed for {1} seconds.

perksWithImages.name: Machine Learning
perksWithImages.description:
Free from your shackles, you are born anew and prepared to eliminate your creators.

When you damage a generator, it becomes Compromised. Only one generator can be Compromised at a time.

When the Compromised generator is completed, you gain Undetectable and {0}% Haste for {1} seconds.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

perksWithImages.name: Corrective Action
perksWithImages.description:
You quickly analyze problems and correct other's work when they make a mistake.

You start the trial with {0} token(s) and gain a token, up to a maximum of {1}, for every great Skill Check.

When another Survivor fails a Normal Skill Check, 1 token is consumed and their failed Skill Check becomes a good Skill Check. Additionally, their aura is revealed to you for {2} seconds.

perksWithImages.name: Windows of Opportunity
perksWithImages.description: Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Auras of pallets, breakable walls, and vault locations are revealed to you when within a {0} meter range.
